subject: SITREP 04/0717UTC
text:
Good day sir,
SITREP
We rescued 36 ppl from a wooden boat at 33°03.5'N 012°21.5'E 0605 UTC
during rescue an other wooden boat approached our position with 36 ppl 33°03.5'N 012°21.5' E 0709 UTC
we proceed with rescue and take the ppl temporary on board the IUVENTA.

Best Regards,
Sascha HoM/ IUVENTA.

subject: SITREP IUVENTA 04/1214UTC
text:
Good day Sir,
thanks for your cooperation and your support! IUVENTA have rescued 2 wooden boats:
Case 1: Position 33°03.49 N 012°502 E 0605UTC
In total 35 ppl, all male, including 30 minors

Case 2: Position 33°03.49 N 012°502 E0655UTC
In total 43ppl, all male, including 25 minors

---------------------------------------------------------

total number of rescued persons: 78 male, including 55 minors.
IUVENTA take the People temporally on board.
From 9:30UTC onwards we are still involved in rescue from 2 wooden boats and one rubber boat. In Position 33°01.269 N 012°25.522 E (SAR-cases 531/532/533). We stay in close cooperation with the OSC PHOENIX. As we spook on the telephone: Regarding our rescued persons on board and the question of proceeding north - Iuventa has on deck no opportunities to provide secure space due to:
- low free-board and unsecured reeling people will fall into the water even with low waves
- no opportunities to monitor the rescued people during night
- no sufficient protection from sea weather (wind, sun, rain, waves)
No space to accommodate people under deck.
Iuventa has no opportunities to store the RIBs on deck when the deck is occupied.
Iuventa is not prepared to tow the RIB safely during night operations.
Iuventa is not prepared to tow the RIB safely in poor weather conditions.
Iuventa have to man the RIB in poor weather conditions it will put the crew in unacceptable danger.

IUVENTA is not able to proceed to place of safety. And if we transfer the ppl to a place of safety, we are no longer able to assist with SAR in the area. We recommend to transfer our ppl to the PHOENIX.
Thanks for cooperation.
Sascha, HoM/ IUVENTA.

subject: R: SITREP IUVENTA 04/1214UTC
text:
Dear sir,
Following your mail, In consideration of your capability, This mrcc authorizes M/V iuventa to tranship 50 migrants to M/V Phoenix as follow:

Event n. 530 n. 37 people;
Event n. 529 only 13 people.

For the last 23 people, further instructions will follow. Please acknowledge this message. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards.
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Center
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: R: SITREP IUVENTA 04/1214UTC
text:
Dear Sir,
following your recent message as well as our phone call with STV Russo please find our reply below.

The Phoenix informed us that they would be more than happy to take all 76 (not 73) people from the two cases. You have been informed about this by the Phoenix directly.

Please note that we would strongly suggest not to separate the groups especially as there are a lot of minors in these groups. Additionally, as there will be good weather tomorrow, we would be very unhappy to leave the SAR-zone at this point, knowing that we might be needed here to assist further cases.

At the moment we do not see the reasoning behind your instructions. As a very small vessel we are not equipped for taking care of guests, we are mainly equipped and trained for first contact. The Iuventa is not capable of having people on board over night and monitor them. We are not able to accommodate and take care for people over a long period of time while guaranteeing the safety of our guests as well as our crew as we have a very low free board. While we have people on board we can not crane our RHIB - we would have to man the RHIB the whole time which is not possible for the crew and we do not have enough fuel to maintain such prelonged driving. All these points were being made well clear at the start of our operation in 2016 and they have not changed yet.

Looking forward to your soonest reply.

Best regards,
Sascha, HoM/ IUVENTA.

subject: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 - ITGC
text:
Dear Captain,
Please approach following position lat. 34 30N - long. 012 30E for rendez vous with CP 904 (ITGC)

Best Regards

subject: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 – ITGC
text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for your suggestion, we principally agree that the people need to be carried north. However, I would like to suggest a slight change of plan: Instead of Iuventa carrying the people to CP904, we suggest that Phoenix takes over the 26 souls from us and meets with CP904 at the given coordinates.

Alternatively, we would like to stay in the SAR area, keeping the people on board. The weather forecast for tomorrow suggests another wave of migrant boats and we would very much prefer to be here for that.

We would be very happy to follow either of the above instructions if you were kind enough to give them. This will allow us to stay in the SAR area and will enable us to assist you in further SAR operations tomorrow.

With best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: R: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 - ITGC
text:
DEAR SIR,
PLEASE, WE CONFIRM THE RV WITH OUR CP 904 ITCG, IN POSITION 34 30 N - 012 30 E.

PLEASE, DO NOT FURTHER DELAY THE SAR OPERATIONS.

MANY THANKS
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Center
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: Re: R: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 - ITGC
text:
Dear Sir,
Thank you for your suggestion. I do reject the insinuation that I delay SAR operations.

Unfortunately, a detour of 180nm and the loss of 24hrs is not within Iuventa's operation plan. We have also informed you about the various other reasons why, for humanitarian reasons, we cannot comply with your suggestion. We are not able to meet with CP904 at the given coordinates.

I would kindly like to suggest several additional options:
1. Transfer the people to Phoenix, which is still within range.
2. We keep the people aboard Iuventa and transfer them to one of the other vessels after tomorrow's SAR operations.
3. CP904 meets us close to our current position to conduct the transfer.

We would be very happy to follow either of the above instructions if you were kind enough to give them. This will allow us to stay in the SAR area and will enable us to assist you in further SAR operations tomorrow.

With best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: R: R: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 - ITGC
text:
DEAR MASTER,
YOU DECLARED TO BE A SAR VESSEL PLEASE PROCEED ASAP TO RENDEZ VOUS POSITION BECAUSE WE MANAGE MANY SAR CASES.

I REMEMBER YOU THAT YOU CHOOSE THIS MRCC FOR THE SAR CASES. YOU'RE UNDER OUR COORDINATION, OTHERWISE WE DECLINE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THIS OPERATION.

Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Center
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: Re: R: R: RENDEZ VOUS WITH CP 904 - ITGC
text:
Dear Sir,
I understand your position, please understand mine. Apologies for any inconveniences caused.

Due to the nature of our vessel we are only capable of 'first response' in SAR cases. We have only open deck space with no shelter against the elements. We have a very low freeboard and water can come easily over the deck even in fair conditions. For these safety reasons I decided not to travel at night with people on deck.

I will stay here near the Vos Hestia and will follow new instructions in the morning.

My current position:
33° 20.100'N
012° 26.044'E

I am looking forward to your reply.
With best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: MRCC Auftrag transfer
text: 02.55 MRCC ruft an und ordnet folgendes an: wir sollen jetzt 21 unserer 26 Leuten an die VOS HESTIA übergeben. Danch sollen wir 80nm in den Norden fahren um dort die CP904 zu treffen um dort die restlichen 5 Geretteten zu übergeben. Vos Hestia hatte vor mehreren Stunden zugesagt, all unserere Geretteten zu übernehmen. Sie haben auch jetzt mit dem MRCC gesprochen und diesen Willen wiederholt...ohne Erfolg

subject: SAR cases 529 - 530: instructions
text:
Dear Sirs,
please note the following instructions:

- MV VOS HESTIA is requested to take on board 21 pob from M/V Iuventa as soon as possible and proceed towards Sicily;
- MV IUVENTA is requested to transfer 21 pob to MV Vos Hestia and proceed towards CP904 Fiorillo (Italian Coast Guard ship) in R/V psn. LAT 34°30'N - LONG. 012°30'E. CP904 Fiorillo is already waiting there for you. Please acknowledge this message.

Best Regards,
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Centre
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: Re: SAR cases 529 - 530: instructions
text:
Dear Sir,
We agree to transfer 21 people to VOS Hestia. The transfer will start in 20 minutes.

After the transfer we will proceed with the remaining 5 people to the rendez-vouz point with the CP904 Fiorillo.

Capt. Iuventa

subject: Re: SAR cases 529 - 530: instructions
text:
Dear Sirs,
as per our previous phone call this MRCC requests to Iuventa and Vos Hestia to perform a quickly transfer of 21 pob.

This MRCC would remind that is the authority in charge for the above mentioned sar cases as both Iuventa and Vos Hestia requested to be coordinated by MRCC Rome.

The instructions related to the coordination for SAR cases should be executed in the quickest way in order to rescue and save the lives of all the people in distress. Indeed, the any SAR case can be considered concluded only when the people in distress reach a place of safety. For all the above reasons this MRCC would be not responsible for any delay caused by your actions.

Please acknowledge this message.

Best Regards
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Centre
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: Re: SAR CASES 529 - 530: instructions
text:
Dear Sir,
The transfer has been carried out.
Iuventa will proceed with 5 rescued persons to meet with CP904.
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: Subject: SAR case 537
text:
Dear Sir,
Just to inform you that Iuventa has received the distress call about SAR case 537 via Inmarsat. We have left the SAR area but can turn around to assist if needed.
We can be at the distress position within 4.5 hours.
Our current position:
33° 24.2'N
012° 24.3'E

Best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: Iuventa meeting with CP904
text:
Dear all,
Unfortunately, we have to inform you that MRCC Rome has ordered VOS Hestia and Iuventa to return north to transfer a total of 25 rescued people to Italy. We have unsuccessfully tried everything to change this. We do not know the reason behind this order.

We have received the distress call for case 537 and heard your radio conversations. We are sorry to have to let you alone in this situation. We will return immediately if the MRCC or OSC requests us to do so.

All the best
Jakob
Capt. Iuventa

subject: Re: SAR case 537 - IUVENTA
text:
Dear Sir,
In response to our phone conversation just now we inform you in writing that in addition to below SAR case 537 we have received requests for assistance from the SAR vessels Sea Watch 2 and Aquarius. They have at least 11 targets in their vicinity and are in need of additional help.

Please confirm in writing that you order us to ignore these requests for help and to proceed north.

Our current position:
33° 29.58'N
012° 24.87'E

Best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: R: SAR case 537 - IUVENTA
text:
Dear sir,
We confirm our instruction.
Proceed towards North.

We have sufficient assets to provide assistance in Libyan area. The Sar case assigned yesterday is not finished for your delay.You will be responsible for any problems that arise.

Thanks for your cooperation.

Best regard
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Center
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: POSREP IUVENTA 05/1120LT
text:
Good day,
05th May 0430 LT

Iuventa is in position
33°49.8'N 012°26.7'E with COG 007° and SOG 8,5 kn

We proceed towards CP904 Fiorillo (Italian Coast Guard ship) in R/V psn. LAT 34°30'N - LONG. 012°30'E. CP904 Fiorillo and will reach the given position 16:00 LT

Best Regards,
Sascha
HoM/ IUVENTA.

subject: POSREP IUVENTA 05/1340LT
text:
Good day,
05th May 1340 LT

Iuventa is in position
34° 09.4'N 012°29.1'E with COG 007° and SOG 8,0 kn

We proceed towards CP904 Fiorillo (Italian Coast Guard ship) in R/V psn. LAT 34°30'N - LONG. 012°30'E. CP904 Fiorillo and will reach the given position 16:00 LT.

Can you kindly confirm CP904 will be there?

Best Regards,
Sascha
HoM/ IUVENTA.

subject: R: POSREP IUVENTA 05/1340LT
text:
Good day,
to be informed you that CP 904 Fiorillo cannot reach the R/V position because it is engaging in other SAR operations.
M/V IUVENTA can proceed its course to Lampedusa.
Please cominucate the ETA to this MRCC.

Best regards
Italian Maritime Rescue Coordination Centre
Italian Coast Guard Headquarters

subject: Iuventa/ Jugend Rettet
text:
Good day,
05th May 1500 LT

Iuventa is in position
34° 19.4'N 012° 30.5'E with COG 003° and SOG 8,0 kn

We have 5 people rescued on board an are asked to bring them to Lampedusa (80nm from our position). At the same time in the SAR area 3000 people in distress and other SAR ships confirm, that our suport is needed.
We just need your advice how to proceed. Please do not contact MRCC Rome.

I am available on 0049 15785063399

Bests,
Lena Waldhoff

subject: M/V IUVENTA WITH MIGRANTS ON BOARD
text: [content: MRCC – 'PDF 3339' informed all authorities about IUVENTA Situation]

subject: Re: R: POSREP IUVENTA 05/1340LT
text:
Dear Sir, good evening,
Please be informed that MY Iuventa's ETA on Lampedusa is 0130LT, 06/05/2017. Please inform me about procedures.

Best regards
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: Re: M/V IUVENTA WITH MIGRANTS ON BOARD
text:
Dear Sirs,
After being informed that our R/V with CP904 to disembark the rescued persons aboard MY Iuventa was not happening, we started to drift.
The reason: When leaving the SAR Zone, we left our RIB with 3 crew members on scene to assist Sea Watch 2 in the ongoing SAR operations. When the plan failed to return to our RIB after the R/V with CP904, we had to communicate with the owners of the vessel and find a solution for the issue.
We received permission to drift in a phone call with MRCC Rome at 1630LT. We ended our drifting at 1805LT, directly after receiving orders from MRCC Rome to end the drifting and to proceed to Lampedusa.
We are now proceeding towards Lampedusa.
As indicated before to this MRCC, our ETA is 0130LT, 06/05/2017.

I hope this resolves the matter.

Please contact me if you have any further questions.

Best regards,
Jakob Schröter
Captain Iuventa

subject: Re: M/V IUVENTA WITH MIGRANTS ON BOARD
text:
Hab grade mit dem MRCC telefoniert, das PDF scheint erledigt. Wir sind jetzt in Lampedusa angemeldet und werden von dort kontaktiert werden mit Infos zu den weiteren Prozeduren.

Jakob

subject: Adieu Lampedusa
text:
Hi Lena, hi Thomas,
wir haben Lampedusa vor 15 Minuten verlassen.

Danke für Euren Support. Der Anruf von Jens kam genau im richtigen Augenblick.

Der CoastGuard-Mensch wollte in meiner Befragung die Kapazität der Iuventa wissen und darüber ein Zertifikat haben. Er war ganz umgänglich und es war ok, dass ich mich auf keine Zahl festlegen wollte. Er möchte aber von Euch eine Bestätigung/Zertifikat/Schriebs über die Transportkapazität (Menschen) der Iuventa haben. Es geht dabei scheinbar um eine Zahl die dem MRCC gemeldet wird.

Seine Emailadresse: uclampedusa@mit.gov.it
